Package com.amazonaws.kinesisvideo.internal.client.mediasource

Interface MediaSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidCameraMediaSource, BytesMediaSource, ImageFileMediaSource
    public interface MediaSource
    Interface representing a media source.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void configure​(MediaSourceConfiguration configuration)
      Configures the media source
      void free()
      Releases resources
      MediaSourceConfiguration getConfiguration()
      Returns the MediaSourceConfiguration used to create this media source
      MediaSourceSink getMediaSourceSink()
      Returns the MediaSourceSink object
      MediaSourceState getMediaSourceState()
      Returns the MediaSourceState
      StreamCallbacks getStreamCallbacks()
      Returns a stream-specific StreamCallbacks implementation if any.
      StreamInfo getStreamInfo()
      Returns the StreamInfo describing the stream this media source produces
      void initialize​(MediaSourceSink mediaSourceSink)
      Initializes the media source with a MediaSourceSink object
      boolean isStopped()
      Returns true if media source is now stopped
      void start()
      Starts the media source
      void stop()
      Stops the media source
